JOB DESCRIPTION: We are looking for an ASP.NET Developer (Fresher to Experienced)  to be responsible for developing and support applications. The responsibilities of ASP.NET Developers include writing code for web applications and enhancing functionalities.As an ASP.NET Developer, you should demonstrate excellent problem-solving skills, high-quality coding skills, and the ability to manage your time efficiently. Ultimately, a top-notch ASP.NET Developer should have superior knowledge of software development, design patterns, and you should be e able to work independently.Candidate should have strong knowledge in Asp.net, MVC, Entity Framework, ADO.NET, .net Core, Web API, JavaScript, JQuery, CSS, Bootstrap and should have strong knowledge in MSSQL or any other RDBMS.ASP.NET Developer Responsibilities:Creating quality applications with coding standardsShould work with front-end developersEnsure junior software engineers to develop according to standards.Should be able to analyze code and provide quick solutions.Using the most updated and appropriate technologies.Designing and building application layersASP.NET Developer Requirements:Any Degree,Should be very good in software programming, problem skill, should be very good to understand complex logics and work independently.Very good working knowledge in ASP.Net, MVC using C# or VB.NetGood knowledge of SQL is a must.Very strong communication skills in both verbal and written.
